subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Accidents and Safety
Luge Racing
lead_paragraph: The International Luge Federation president, Josef Fendt, acknowledged that the sport’s image had been damaged by Nodar Kumaritashvili’s death at the Vancouver Olympics.
snippet: The International Luge Federation president, Josef Fendt, acknowledged that the sport’s image had been damaged by Nodar Kumaritashvili’s death at the Vancouver Olympics.
